title: Birds, Bees and RVs: Trailer Travails Book 3
description: Life in a Florida Retirement Mobile Home Park is - complicated. It's spring time and romance is in the air - all around Patty whether she wants it there or not. Everywhere she looks people are in love, or dead - or both. Passions erupt on all sides and of all kinds among neighbors, family, friends and frenemies. Murder happens.Was it motivated by fear, jealousy, love or simply being crazy? Can Patty even hope to salvage the life around her? Will solving the murder of a friend also result in her getting killed?
author: Mary Lu Scholl
